body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections              Collections         Ala loa NPS  A Cultural History of Three Traditional Hawaiian Sites on the West Coast of Hawai'i Island This document provides an excellent resource for detailed information regarding not only Pu'ukohol? Heiau National Historic Site, but also for Kaloko-Honok?hau National Historical Park and Pu'uhonua o H?naunau National Historical Park. You will find information about the Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail which runs through all three National Park units on the west side of the island of Hawaii. The trail continues around the southern point of the island connecting to Hawai`i Volcanoes National Park on the east side.
